stock.capability.name: stock_fetcher
stock.capability.description: Fetches live stock prices (e.g., AAPL, TSLA, MSFT)

weather.capability.name: weather_fetcher
weather.capability.description: Fetches current weather for a location

time.capability.name: time_fetcher
time.capability.description: Fetches current time for a timezone or city

web-search.capability.name: web_search
web-search.capability.description: Searches the web for current information, recent news, people, characters, events, or anything the model might not know or that requires up-to-date data
